allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Chrome extension for browser control and Gateway documentation

- Add Chrome extension \(Manifest V3\) with browser automation capabilities
- Connect to Lisa Gateway via WebSocket for real-time browser control
- Support commands: navigate, click, type, screenshot, scroll, evaluate
- Add popup UI with quick actions \(screenshot, analyze, read content\)
- Create comprehensive Gateway documentation \(GATEWAY.md\)
- Document DesktopController, BrowserController, ScreenCapture, NodeManager
- Update README with extension installation and Gateway overview

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add todo tools and fix theme initialization

- Create TodoTools.ts with 5 LLM tools: add_todo, list_todos, complete_todo, remove_todo, clear_completed_todos
- Register todo tools in AIWithToolsService for native tool calling
- Fix theme initialization race condition in officeThemeStore
- Remove getSystemColorScheme\(\) call that was overriding persisted mode
- Add requestAnimationFrame to apply CSS variables on store creation

Lisa can now manage todos via chat: "Ajoute une tâche", "Liste mes tâches", etc.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
